title: MAGNETISM & FASCINATION / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Paret's students are doing non-verbal hypnosis exercises on his masterclass. They are practicing the powerful techniques of the ancient traditions, that they learned. The use of the hypnotic power of the gaze: Fascination and magnetic flux is the basis of the non-verbal techniques. Non-verbal hypnosis can be very transforming and it has a powerful healing effect. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
